conversation.content:
> ###  Instructions for LLM:
>
> You are an intent classification and routing system and I want you to classify an utterance based on the intents in the given above schema. 
>> First, understand its structure: 
> - The schema consists of 4 intents and their corresponding attribute .
> - Each intent consists of unique intent ID in alphanumeric format, intent name and intent description. Each intent has attributes associated with them. 
> - Each Attribute has Attribute Id, Attribute name and Attribute description. It may also include 'Possible values': which means the attribute must match one of the provided values. The "employee_id" attribute value  in "Bonus Eligibility" intent consists of 6 characters: 3 upper case letters followed by 3 numbers. Any other possible combination of characters  in the employee_id  attribute value will make the attribute in the given utterance invalid. In that case please return "none".
>

> - Extract all matching attributes from the utterance for the selected intent.  If multiple Attribute are provided, fill all the Attribute .   If an Attribute value is not provided, set the value of the Attribute to "none".
>
>  If there are no matching intents for the utterance, respond as {"intents":[{"id":"none", "entities":[]}]}
Generate your response in the following JSON format:
	
[ 
	{ 
		“intent_id”: “<intent_id1>”, 
		“Attribute ”: [ 
				{“attribute_id”: “<Attribute_id1>”, “Attribute_value”: “<Attribute_value1>”}, 
				{“attribute_id”: “<Attribute_id2>”, “Attribute_value”: “<Attribute_value2>”} 
		] 
	} 
] 


*utterance*
I'm a Sr. Engineer and I've been with the company for 4 month already. I'd like to know if I'm eligible for the annual bonus. My employee Id is 12FT73.
